## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [16S Microbial Analysis with mothur (extended)](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/microbiome/tutorials/mothur-miseq-sop/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
